search_input:
The textural details of previous occupants are kept intact. There is a map-like pattern on the concrete floor. It is a space of pure white. . . . the floor. Thats right. The floor. Its typically the largest horizontal surface in the room and undeniably the most used. To provide a flat, horizontal surface on which desired human activities can take place, all buildings contain at least one floor. The bedroom floor, yours or someone else's, is a great place for a quickie, Having sex on the floor always implies that you just couldn't wait for the bed, The floor is hard and cold even if you have carpet, yet it's incredibly erotic. The floor acts as a large radiator storing heat at night and releasing it during the day. FLOOR Infinitely harmless, the floor Is obliged to offer Its occupants stability - yet receives from Its users systematic harshness, If not abuse, in return. On the floor; refers to movements performed with the working leg touching the floor as opposed to in the air. Move across the floor. When you move across the floor either by yourself, in a line, or with a group, you must be safe and courteous.

*The floor's tactile roughness can be soothing, a gentle reminder of the world's imperfections. In the silence, the creaks and groans of the floorboards become a symphony of worn-out secrets.  |*
suggested_query: The floor's tactile roughness can be soothing, a gentle reminder of the world's imperfections. In the silence, the creaks and groans of the floorboards become a symphony of worn-out secrets.  |
